```{r}
get_indicator_met = function(label, description, image) {
  return(sprintf("<div class='indicator3'><div class='image'><img src='%s'></img></div><div class='indicator-content'><h2 class='label'>%s</h2><p>%s</p></div></div>", image, label, description))
}
get_indicator_met_ = function(label, description) {
  return(sprintf("<div class='indicator3'><div class='indicator-content'><h2 class='label'>%s</h2><p>%s</p></div></div>", label, description))
}
```
